name: R4B-Organization-R5-Organization
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Organization into FHIR R5

element.display: A grouping of people or organizations with a common purpose

target.display: A grouping of people or organizations with a common purpose
target.comment: R4B `Organization` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization`

element.display: Whether the organization's record is still in active use

target.display: Whether the organization's record is still in active use
target.comment: R4B `Organization.active` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.active`

element.display: An address for the organization
A list of alternate names that the organization is known as, or was known as in the past

target.display: A list of alternate names that the organization is known as, or was known as in the past
target.comment: R4B `Organization.alias` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.alias`

element.display: Contact for the organization for a certain purpose

target.display: Official contact details for the Organization
target.comment: R4B `Organization.contact` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Organization.contact` - contact has change due to type change: R4B contact BackboneElement has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 contact

element.display: Visiting or postal addresses for the contact
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
A name associated with the contact
The type of contact
Contact details (telephone, email, etc.)  for a contact
Contained, inline Resources

target.comment: R4B `Organization.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.contained`

element.display: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the organization

target.display: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the organization
target.comment: R4B `Organization.endpoint` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.endpoint`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R4B `Organization.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Organization.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.comment: R4B `Organization.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.id`

element.display: Identifies this organization  across multiple systems

target.display: Identifies this organization  across multiple systems
target.comment: R4B `Organization.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Organization.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.comment: R4B `Organization.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Organization.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.comment: R4B `Organization.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.comment: R4B `Organization.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Organization.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Name used for the organization

target.comment: R4B `Organization.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.name`

element.display: The organization of which this organization forms a part

target.display: The organization of which this organization forms a part
target.comment: R4B `Organization.partOf` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.partOf`

element.display: A contact detail for the organization
Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Organization.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.text`

element.display: Kind of organization

target.comment: R4B `Organization.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Organization.type`
